name: Albion South Beach

reviews.text: The hotel was in a great location for all the sights of miami - the night life was close enough to walk safely to and from but far enough away that if you needed a good nights sleep you got one... close to all the shops, cafes, restaurants, and the beach!! its a basic hotel but its clean, the staff were friendly and helpful and i wouldnt hesitate in recommending this hotel to anyone!
reviews.title: Great hotel, great location!

reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel for 9 days on vacation, My "Petite" room cost nearly $50 cheaper than standard "King" room and amounted to approximately $130 including taxes. But I can not say that the room was tight. For a man of medium build it was quite acceptable and I would not notice a difference using the "king" room.

reviews.text: Indoor space is clean, minimalist contemporary design decoration, practical furniture to the extent necessary, air conditioner, wardrobe, bar, phone, LCD television. Maids do the work in good faith, sand and dirt are washed thoroughly. The main indicator - bathroom and toilet will make the hotel an excellent reputation. White tile, modern plumbing, sterile toilet (!), Napkins and toilet paper are always presented in excess, No smell! In a word - ROOM IS A DEFINITELY CLEAN!

reviews.text: Fantastic location, very clean hotel and the hotel staff are very friendly and helpful. Rooms are great very clean, pool area is fantastic, plenty of sun beds and sun umbrellas. Great food and drink menu during the day on offer at the pool. Only one door from main shopping and restaurant areas and only a couple of streets from the beach. Special mention to very funny barman Carlos! We loved our stay at Albion and will be returning next year, can't wait.

reviews.text: We were very glad to have made this choice for our hotel in South Beach. What struck us the most is the quality of the staff, they were very helpful from the moment we stepped foot in the hotel until we left. The hotel is near a drugstore accross the street, one block from the Lincoln road mall (about 6 blocks of restaurants, terrasses and boutiques) and 2 blocks from the beach. The pool size was also important since many hotels offer very small size pools. This one was perfect. The hotel is not recent but is confortable. Even though we didn't eat at the hotel I had a glimpse at the buffet for breakfast and it seemed really delicious. The only thing I thought was missing was a complimentary coffee which would have been great. I would also ask for a room located in the back of the hotel if I were sensitive to noise since there is construction not directly in front but near the hotel.

aka: Albion South Beach Hotel Miami Beach
description: Welcome to the Albion Hotel, a hip South Beach Hotel and one of the coolest Miami Beach Hotels located directly on stylish Lincoln Road Mall. The Albion Hotel location is considered the most central to shopping, dining, and nightlife of all South Beach Hotels. The Albion Hotel South Beach is ideally situated in the heart of flashy South Beach Miami, Florida. Miles of beautiful beaches and the Miami Beach Convention Center are just one block from this Miami Beach Hotel gem. Guests at Albion, a 3.5 star South Beach Hotel enjoy convenient access to Florida tourist attractions, many of which are within walking distance to the hotel, including Ocean Drive and the Art Deco District. Miami International Airport is approximately 20 minutes from Albion Hotel South Beach. Transportation from Miami International Airport (MIA) can be arranged through the Albion Hotel Miami Beach for a fee.
